text: wadrb -ayha alrswl- lmshrky qawmak alraddin ldewtk mathalaan yaetabirun bh, wahu qisat 'ahl alqryt, hin dhahab 'iilayhim almrslwn, 'iidh 'arsalna 'iilayhim rswlyn ldewthm 'iilaa al'iiman biallah wtrk eibadat ghyrh, fkdhdhab 'ahl alqaryat alrswlyn, fezzaznahma wqwynahma birasul thalth, faqal althlatht li'ahl alqryt: 'iinaa 'iilaykum -ayha alqwm- mrslwn
